it's a nice game, fun to play with your friends, but it can get boring without friends. Msotly because the cery toxic community and the many hackers and smurfers (last two mentioned, only if you play without prime) but overall a good game.

Non é un gioco di sparare come gli altri devi essere più preciso nella mira regolarla se sei vicino o lontano e i suoni sono importantissimi soprattutto i passi .. Gli unici difetti importanti secondo me sono i vac ban a caso i troppi hacker i ban dalle competitive per 7 giorni e l'attesa di un giorno quando da no rank vinci due competitive di seguito
Honestly the only shooter game that involves skill and practice to be good at. That's why it's the best around!

Great game! very fun. Takes time to get good at it though, but that keeps you playing. Theres alot of hackers and smurfs in the game that ruin the experience. But thats the only negative thing. The games perfect!!!
very cool and competetive game...im having a blast
